alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 3:52PM CDT until October 12 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DAVIDSON...SOUTHEASTERN DICKSON...WESTERN WILLIAMSON...SOUTHEASTERN CHEATHAM AND NORTHEASTERN HICKMAN COUNTIES... At 352 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near White Bluff to 10 miles east of Centerville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ashland City, White Bluff, Kingston Springs, Pegram, Burns, Fairview, Bellevue, Bells Bend, Primm Springs, Leipers Fork and Natchez Trace At Highway 96. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 176 and 202. Interstate 840 between mile markers 1 and 23. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
